name: Tsuro: The Game of The Path
description: Create your own journey with Tsuro: The Game of the Path. Place a tile and slide your stone along the path created, but take care! Other players' paths can lead you in the wrong direction - or off the board entirely! Paths will cross and connect, and the choices you make affect all the journeys across the board.

name: Crab Game
description: Crab Game is a First-Person Multiplayer game where you fight for the ultimate cash price in different minigames based on children's games, until only one player is left to claim it all. Definitely not based on any online streaming pop culture korean tv shows, as that would get me in legal trouble, so we're certainly not doing that.

name: Traffic Confusion
description:
Traffic Confusion is a traffic congestion simulation game where the goal is to clear the the map of cars which each has their own destination while keeping accidents and potential deaths to a minimum.
Stress among the drivers will build up while they're waiting stuck in traffic or congestion is too high etc. You lose the game if the stress level reaches its maximum point.

name: Traffic Confusion II
description: Just like the original, the goal is to solve the traffic congestion while keeping stress level of the drivers low. You lose if stress reaches its maximum point.

name: Christmas Shooting
description: Sin descripción

name: Five Generations
description: Five Generations is an RPG simulation game where you pit yours and your opponents deck of units fighting in a 24x24 square map.

name: Noara: The Conspiracy
description: Noara: The Conspiracy is a 3D strategy game based on the universe of Noara. At the head of an army where each unit has its own set of skills, the aim of the game is to destroy the opponent's stronghold in order to win the battle. It revisits the turn-based strategy game by combining it with the dynamism of real-time games and the reflection of chess games. From a brand new genre, Noara is a Multiplayer Online Chess Arena (MOCA) with a unique gameplay.

name: Bio Evil 4
description: Bio Evil 4 is a side-scrolling demake of Resident Evil 4.

name: Pokémon Café ReMix
description:
Link together Pokémon icons to clear puzzles as you work to build up your very own café in Pokémon Café ReMix, a free-to-start game for Nintendo Switch systems! Recruit Pokémon to help out at the café (in their stylish uniforms) by building friendships while expanding your café and menu offerings by completing puzzles. Each Pokémon staff member has a Café Skill that will come in handy solving puzzles!

Complete touch-based challenges in this free-to-start puzzle game

Strategize the best way to clear Pokémon icons within the turn limit in adorable-yet-challenging puzzles. Use your puzzle skills to complete the objective and employ the help of every Pokémon’s Café Skills for some extra oomph! In addition to Café Skills, each Pokémon staff member has a specialty and specialty gimmicks they can destroy with ease—Eevee can make quick work of sugar cubes, for example. Match a Pokémon’s specialty with the drink or dish you’re making to get bonuses in puzzles.

Remixed fun for everyone

Pokémon Café ReMix is a revamped version of the original Pokémon Café Mix game. Puzzles have been refreshed and there are even more Pokémon to discover and recruit. Your Pokémon may outfit themselves in café chic with newly added dress-up options and can improve their abilities through training puzzles! If you’ve played the original, your golden acorns will all transfer over to Pokémon Café ReMix.

name: The Dark Pictures Anthology: The Devil in Me
description:
Step into the anthology's most bloodcurdling story yet, where each of your choices once again determines who lives and who dies. Watch in horror as your unfortunate crew falls prey to a twisted host who is observing their every move.

We hope you enjoy your stay...

name: Howloween Hero
description: A spooky trick-or-treat adventure about a mischievous puppy on a mission to score the evening's best candy. Create your costume, explore the neighborhood, and help your friends track down a menacing monster to save Halloween.

name: Kindling Spirits
description: Sin descripción

name: Angrymals
description: Inspired by Worms and Angry Birds, this game let you challenge your friends online (player vs player) choosing your fortress, wierd weapons and animals with crazy special moves. It's a 2D slingshot turn based game.

name: Gyakuten Touhou 2
description: The game is the second entry in the Gyakuten Touhou series. The game follows Aya Shameimaru as a defense attorney who investigates four cases. The gameplay is mostly the same as in the previous game, divided into two types of phases: investigations, where Aya searches the crime scene for evidence and talks to witnesses, and rebuttals to learn new information. During the courtroom sections, Aya defends their client and cross-examines the witnesses's testimonies using the evidence found during the investigations.

name: Red Dragon Rampage
description: Defend your red companion in this Action/Defense game from the creator of Toss the Turtle.

name: Buff Imposter
description:
The imposter is after you! You are in a scary maze and need to find the milk that will give you the power to fight the buff imposter. The creepy buff impostor can hide behind any door, so be careful.

In this nightmare horror game we paid special attention to the difficulty levels, also the maze changes with every adventure! Only a few players will manage to beat this difficult horror game!

You have to be smart and avoid the buff imposter at all times. You will level up overtime, can you surpass the buff impostors strength?

name: Zurry: The Ritual Bat
description: Zurry The Ritual Bat is an arcade game in which you play as Zurry, a bat sent out to gather ingredients for the Halloween Ritual scattered around worlds.

name: Kaiju Klimb
description: Heavily inspired in the monsters from The PowerPuff Girls, famous giant creatures like Godzilla, King Kong, and Mothra as well as mythology from countless cultures around the world, Kaiju Klimb evokes that addicting gameplay from simple games into a sweet casual style, perfectly setting the mood for the destruction of earth while you relax!

name: Pipo's on the Run
description: Pipo's on the Run is about a cat endlessly running through roofs. Jump on chimneys and avoid weather vanes in this cute pixel art game!

name: Beneath the shadows
description: "What is hidden beneath all the pain and sufferings. What is hidden beneath those shadows. What secrets does the Manfred mansion hold withing its walls". play as a regular man trying to understand what secrets is hidden inside the mansion within the woods

name: Ctrl Alt Ego
description: Transmit your disembodied ego between robots and devices and exploit their capabilities in first-person very British 70s/80s era sci-fi immersive sim Ctrl Alt Ego. Tool-up and break bad bots into broken bits, or sneak a bug quietly into the system as if you were never there.

name: My Place
description: My Place is a 2017 horror game that acts like a normal indie game, but when the player gets more and more into the game, it begins to act corrupt like something is wrong with it and it's up to the player to explore the corruption this game has until there's an end. It features a story of a suspicious "Rose" that is making the game act very strange. It also features characters you meet and some bosses you kill with a powerful flower that you obtain later in the game. You have to obtain the supplies to make the key which leads to the exit of freedom with little you have. But the question is "is it really an exit"?

name: Time of the Dead
description: LucyDream's new otome game centered around a girl in zombie-infested Joseon.

name: New Super Mario All-Stars HD
description:
New Super Mario All-Stars HD is a mod of New Super Mario Bros. Wii which recreates many Super Mario Bros. games in the NSMB engine.

List of recreations:

Donkey Kong
Mario Bros.
Super Mario Bros.
Super Mario Bros.: The Lost Levels
Super Mario Bros. 2
Super Mario Land
Super Mario Land 2: 6 Golden Coins
Super Mario Bros. 3
Super Mario World
Mario is Missing!
Hotel Mario

name: Intruder in Antiquonia
description: In this classic point-and-click adventure, Sarah does not remember how she got to Antiquonia, but she has plenty of time to unravel the puzzle of her past as she explores the town where the Internet is not welcome. A beautiful adventure with high-resolution 2D graphics and a lovely soundtrack.

name: BS Marvelous: Camp Arnold - Course 1
description:
The first part (week) of BS Marvelous: Camp Arnold.

BS Marvelous: Time Athletics is a Downloadable 4-part Soundlink game for the Satellaview that ran between January 1, 1996 and January 31, 1996. The game was broadcast in as a rerun in April, 1996.

name: BS Marvelous: Camp Arnold - Course 2
description:
The second part (week) of BS Marvelous: Camp Arnold.

BS Marvelous: Time Athletics is a Downloadable 4-part Soundlink game for the Satellaview that ran between January 1, 1996 and January 31, 1996. The game was broadcast in as a rerun in April, 1996.

name: BS Marvelous: Camp Arnold - Course 3
description:
The third part (week) of BS Marvelous: Camp Arnold.

BS Marvelous: Time Athletics is a Downloadable 4-part Soundlink game for the Satellaview that ran between January 1, 1996 and January 31, 1996. The game was broadcast in as a rerun in April, 1996.

name: BS Marvelous: Camp Arnold - Course 4
description:
The fourth and final part (week) of BS Marvelous: Camp Arnold.

BS Marvelous: Time Athletics is a Downloadable 4-part Soundlink game for the Satellaview that ran between January 1, 1996 and January 31, 1996. The game was broadcast in as a rerun in April, 1996.

BS Marvelous: Time Athletic is a Downloadable 4-part Soundlink game for the Satellaview that ran between January 1, 1996 and January 31, 1996. The game was broadcast in as a rerun in April, 1996.

BS Marvelous: Time Athletic is a Downloadable 4-part Soundlink game for the Satellaview that ran between January 1, 1996 and January 31, 1996. The game was broadcast in as a rerun in April, 1996.

BS Marvelous: Time Athletic is a Downloadable 4-part Soundlink game for the Satellaview that ran between January 1, 1996 and January 31, 1996. The game was broadcast in as a rerun in April, 1996.

name: Crypto Raiders
description:
Raid dungeons, earn gear, and level up. Crypto Raiders is an NFT-based dungeon crawler on the Polygon network with a goal of being the biggest MMORPG NFT Game.

Go on quests, fight MOBs, do PvP, and more. Start your adventure today!

name: BS Fire Emblem: Archanea Senki-hen - Dai-1-wa: Palace Kanraku
description:
The first part of BS Fire Emblem Archanea Senki-hen (BS Fire Emblem: Akaneia Senki-hen).
It is a turn-based tactical RPG set in the fantasy world of the Fire Emblem universe. It is based on the engine for the January 1994 Super Famicom release, Fire Emblem: Monshou no Nazo, and the gameplay is largely the same. Gameplay involves the tactical movement of character units through a map grid in order to defeat the opposition militarily.

name: BS Fire Emblem: Archanea Senki-hen - Dai-2-wa: Akai Ryuu Kishi
description:
The second part of BS Fire Emblem Archanea Senki-hen (BS Fire Emblem: Akaneia Senki-hen).
It is a turn-based tactical RPG set in the fantasy world of the Fire Emblem universe. It is based on the engine for the January 1994 Super Famicom release, Fire Emblem: Monshou no Nazo, and the gameplay is largely the same. Gameplay involves the tactical movement of character units through a map grid in order to defeat the opposition militarily.

name: BS Fire Emblem: Archanea Senki-hen - Dai-3-wa: Seigi no Touzokudan
description:
The third part of BS Fire Emblem Archanea Senki-hen (BS Fire Emblem: Akaneia Senki-hen).
It is a turn-based tactical RPG set in the fantasy world of the Fire Emblem universe. It is based on the engine for the January 1994 Super Famicom release, Fire Emblem: Monshou no Nazo, and the gameplay is largely the same. Gameplay involves the tactical movement of character units through a map grid in order to defeat the opposition militarily.

name: BS Fire Emblem: Archanea Senki-hen - Dai-4-wa: Hajimari no Toki
description:
The fourth part of BS Fire Emblem Archanea Senki-hen (BS Fire Emblem: Akaneia Senki-hen).
It is a turn-based tactical RPG set in the fantasy world of the Fire Emblem universe. It is based on the engine for the January 1994 Super Famicom release, Fire Emblem: Monshou no Nazo, and the gameplay is largely the same. Gameplay involves the tactical movement of character units through a map grid in order to defeat the opposition militarily.

name: Burrows
description:
After leaving behind his former life in 1920's New Orleans, a jaded possum named Grey finds himself thrown into an unending nightmare by the enigmatic bartender, Virgil. Lost in a churning sea of souls, Grey comes across a group of men somehow connected to his former home, a plantation replete with it's own dark history. Just as quickly as they find each other they're suddenly taken away, leaving Grey only one option:
Dive into their memories and find out what caused this in the first place.

Explore various locations throughout time such as 1960s New York, 1980s Los Angeles ect. and strengthen your bonds with friends new and old. Many choices will lie before you and the results will have high stakes. Virgil's game is a gamble and you're his bet. Will you play into his hand, try to return to your old life or forge a new future?

name: Mega Man 11: Amiibo Edition
description:
A GameStop/EB Games exclusive edition of Mega Man 11 that was only released in North America.

Mega Man 11: amiibo Edition includes:
- A physical copy of Mega Man 11
- An exclusive Mega Man series Mega Man amiibo
- A Dr. Wily logo adhesive patch
- Stickers of Mega Man, Rush, Dr. Wily, and the Mega Man 11 logo
- A microfiber cloth with the game's stage select screen on it

name: One Night at Flumpty's 3
description:
"Hiya, best friend!"

Flumpty Bumpty is back again with all of his strange companions. You're his friend, too! ...Aren't you? Join the gang for one last round of "survival hide-and-seek" until the clock strikes 6 AM.

This time, you're armed with little more than a point-and-click camera with a flash, and the room you're staying in is freezing. it's too bad you couldn't bundle up ahead of time.

The egg is waiting for you...

name: The BioWare Bundle
description: Experience two great games from the award-winning developer BioWare.

name: Knights of the Tiny Table
description: Help King Arthur and his Knights defend the realm. Slay the evil entities with a combination of lucky dice rolls and clever tactics.

name: Geki Atsu!! Pachige Damashii Vol.2: Evangelion - Shinjitsu no Tsubasa
description: Sin descripción

name: Rollercoaster Tycoon 3
description:
RollerCoaster Tycoon 3 is the classic bestselling PC strategy simulation that now brings the fun of a roller coaster park right to your iPhone or iPad!

With a new mobile-friendly UI, the creativity, depth and sophistication of the classic PC game.

name: Pac-Man Arrangement
description: Pac-Man Arrangement is a 2005 video game, initially released as part of the Namco Museum Battle Collection compilation for the PSP. It shares its name with a very similar Pac-Man game from a decade prior - to avoid confusion, some later re-releases were renamed to Pac-Man Remix.

name: Galaga Arrangement
description: The 2005 release Namco Museum Battle Collection included another game titled Galaga Arrangement. However, it was not the same game. This title was re-released on Xbox 360 in Namco Museum: Virtual Arcade. It was than re-released on the iPhone under the name Galaga Remix. It featured new bosses and weapons, as well as the original Galaga.

name: Dig Dug Arrangement
description: Sin descripción

name: New Rally-X Arrangement
description: Sin descripción

name: The Dream
description: The Dream is a psychological horror game that simulates a dream that repeats itself over and over again when you do something wrong.

name: Fate Chapter 2: The Beginning
description: Fate Chapter 2 is a psychological horror game with a playtime of about 5-6 hours. It includes many puzzles and gnarly scenes and is a single player game. In this game there is blood sexual content and strong language. There are many scenes of blood, dismembered people and much more.

name: Mysteries Under Lake Ophelia
description: In Mysteries Under Lake Ophelia you play as a young kid who has decided to fish at the titular Lake Ophelia. You'll find yourself simply fishing the day away and trading in those fish for either a yummy meal or some new gear.

name: Forgotten Tunnels: Episode 1
description: Short Horror Game

description: halloween celtic folk metal folk-metal

description: Save the world from the curse of the Spider King.

description: Flow like water. Don't gotta go fast!

description: Sin descripción

name: Three Games
description: Three Games is a compilation of three games made by one user: Witch Game, Bin Game and Bug Game.

name: Forgotten Tunnels: Episode 2
description: Forgotten tunnels episode 2 is a short horror expericence.

name: My Dear Neighbor, edition 404
description: Go to your neighbor’s house for dinner and end up in a glitchy nightmare !

name: 10 Hours Below
description:
10 Hours Below is a game about exploring a scene using a Timeline to find monsters in a 10 hours long animation!

You can try to search actively, or just let the game run in background for 10 hours and see the environment evolve. I think finding the 3 monsters require a lot of patience.

name: Mag
description: Sin descripción

name: R.E.M. scape
description: A game based on short snippets of dreams I've had.

name: Wanrobo

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Biohazard
description: Revisit the Original Biohazard in First Person View

name: Restricted Section
description: Sneak into a forbidden library in your monastery to investigate a series of strange murders.

name: Hellhunt GB 1991
description: Back in 1991, my game Hellhunt released its GB version, a total of 3 levels, 3 weapons. Check it now, let's get the feel about what FPS might look like in 1991.

name: Extraneum
description: Fight your way through mutated fiends and stop their progress in this old school FPS

description: Jogo Satanista para Praticar o Mal is a visual novel that tells the story of creating a website for your friend.

A short game about time.

name: Wayfarer

name: War 2020: A Fight Against CoronaVirus
description: This Game Is For Fun to Fight Against Corona Virus or COVID-19.

name: Cocoa 2: Twenty Four Hour Parsley People
description: Huge, 76 screen, platform puzzle adventure for the Sinclair ZX Spectrum. Scored 10/10 in Planeta Sinclair Review.

name: Wake Up
description: Live authoritarianism through a minimalist narrative experience.

name: Seedship
description: A randomly generated text-adventure game about surveying planets for colonization for the remaining survivors of Earth.

name: Goodbye
description: say goodbye before you go

name: Ascendance
description:
Ascendance is a text-based fantasy love story about the first contact between humanity and the extraterrestrial beings known as The Y.

Though the premise is a very fertile (and fun!) ground for sci-fi, Ascendance is inspired by several concepts from different spiritualist philosophies, as well as by great fantasy stories, so it might bring a different perspective for you!

name: Speaker
description: What do you See?

name: The Nameless
description: A story based loosely on the fey and other myths. Will you find out what happened before it comes for you?

name: Walk with me.
description: conversations between a young god and a heart of stone.

name: In Requiem
description: Explore the remnants of an ancient civilisation based on the poem Ozymandias by Percy B. Shelley.

name: Black Baby Classic
description: Sin descripción

name: Gar's Den
description: Will you enter the dungeon? Will you survive? Will you make fat stacks of $? Will you transform Gar's Den into Player's Den???

description: Explore the Void, alter the past, make friends!

name: Hybrid
description: These people aren't like you.

name: Jobhunt
description: hunt for job

name: Devotionalia
description:
The high priest of an obscure cult is preparing a ritual. Don the priest’s sacred mantle, for these holy labors are yours to direct. You may carve a votive, lead a prayer, or make a sacrifice — but you must see to the task with care. Unearthly eyes gaze down upon you from the sea above. Will your devotion reach them?

Does it matter?

description: A historic gay romance set in Medieval Baghdad

name: I, For One, Welcome Our New Lady Knight Overlords!
description: For the Global Game Jam 2020

name: B-e-e-t-l-e
description:
Embark on a strange journey to find your lost beetle. No swords or shields are needed—your keyboard will suffice.

b-e-e-t-l-e is a typing game minus the chaos and the anxiety. Type at your leisure and enjoy a chill, relaxing adventure filled with retro scenery.

name: Unistar
description: You play as Haruno Hajime, a video game-loving introvert who wants to spend his last few months as a high school senior in peace. Peace never came that easy to him when he was forced to act as senior class president. And unfortunately, to top it all off, chaos is knocking at graduation's front door when he and the council members discover that they are... magical boys!?

name: Keda
description: A Furry Visual Novel

name: Follower A
description:
Created for O2A2 Jam 2020.

I am the villainess' nameless follower A but it seems that she knows my name.

name: Strangers at night
description: Taking a bike ride at night through the city, you encounter strangers and strike up conversations.

name: Special girls
description:
special girls special girls special girls

randomized special occasions for special girls

description: A shop full of items imbued with memories

name: Paisible Soirée au Fil d'Étoiles

description: A platformer for the birds!

name: Makin Biscuits
description: Makin Biscuits is a short, no-pressure browser game that combines visual novel and adventure game elements.

name: Sanki
description: It's winter. Let's go sledding. Ride the slope until you stop or crash.

name: Robo-tea: 1cup!
description: let's go on a cute, queer robot date!

name: Homebound
description: A choice-driven game about managing your mental well-being throughout lockdown.

name: This Trip: Hunted in Forest
description: This trip is a survival horror game from the first person. You love to go geocaching and do this hobby often. But one night everything changes and geocaching takes a completely different turn.

name: Villager
description: Gather resources and build a cosy little town!

name: Aeronaut
description: Pilot an adorable, customizable biplane! Explore the world! Deliver mail from the skies!

name: Moonshine and I: Sansevieria
description: To be a human, to be a plant

name: Love is Strange
description: A fan dating vn based off Life is Strange.

name: Candied Violets
description: Candied Violets is a role playing game full of cooperation and fun. Roll to generate your woodland characters and try not to set anything on fire. Share your triumphs and your failures with those you love, and maybe a nice cup of tea!

name: The Pirate Mermaid
description: Be the hero or villain of your own fairytale in this fantasy otome visual novel.

name: The Journey Home
description: Sin descripción

name: Blossom
description: a digital flower/anemone thing for you to play and relax with

name: Tender Love and Care: A Leorio Dating Sim!
description: Can you help Kurapika win Leorio's heart?

name: Wolf & Eggs!
description: Catch all eggs! :)

name: Heart on Your Sleeve
description: Picking an outfit for a dinner date is easier in theory.

name: So Obscure;
description: so obscure; is a visual novel played through the interface of Sam's computer, where the majority of the game's story is told through a series of chat conversations.

name: Xoxo Droplets: Extended Edition
description: A massive otome dating sim!

name: Two girls make a game
description: A game about girls making a game about girls.

name: Defaction
description: A narrative game about societal expectations and (not) fitting in

name: The Bends
description:
"The Bends" is a Haunted PS1 Summer Jam entry( HPS1 Summer of Shivers - itch.io ), made in unreal engine 4 and meant to be played with a xbox one controller, and headphones.

Use your best judgement to guide yourself out of the depths and raise above the grip of the unknown.

name: Zeitgeist
description: Equipped with your pot plant companion, travel through the roots of time delving into the past and present depths of an ancient submerged city. Exploring grand halls, navigating between walls, and taking advantage of ancient mechanisms on your mission to steal the heart of the city.

name: HR2
description: HR2 is a tower building simulator where your goal is to build a highrise building as tall as possible. Your concerns are not with floor designs or business strategies. Instead, in HR2 your role is that of a contractor/engineer commissioned to build the tower. Therefore, your goal is to build the tower with structurally sound design to guarantee that it will not come crashing down once you get to the 10th floor.

name: Prince Charmless
description: Sin descripción

name: Vapor Maze
description: Explore a maze, with strange doors scattered about. The key to opening them: emotions.

name: Flesh 4 Boy
description: See if you have the guts to be a parent

name: Our Adventure Time
description: Sin descripción

As Audrey enters her year of high school, she swirls into a crisis as she realizes that her bitterness and contempt has prevented her from having an enjoyable childhood, and there’s not much of it left to fix that. Her cynical outlook starts to change, however, when she meets Jun, a boy who just moved into her town.

name: Skullz

name: Blob Wars: Metal Blob Solid

name: Were House
description:
By accident, Dori stumbles across the monstrous secret behind popular haunted house, the Were House - and then they get roped into working alongside the crew on Halloween night!
A job's a job, right? But will Dori make it through three days of hard work preparing for the big night - and will they grow closer to any of the monsters...?
Were House is a comedic visual novel with dashes of romance! There are three routes to pursue: werewolf Cormac, kelpie Morag, and gorgon Esseth.

name: Trolls and Tribulations: Omega
description: Sin descripción

name: The Emperor's Own
description: The Emperor's Own is a story-driven adventure game with RPG elements, set in an alternate universe, inspired by the Russian Empire at the dawn of the 19th century. It features multi-dimensional characters, difficult moral dilemmas, and a mature, branching narrative.

name: The Conveni: Ano Machi wo Dokusen Seyo
description: In the Coveni you run a convenience store where the goal is to be successful and beat the competition.

name: Metropolismania 4
description: Introducing the definitive version of the city planning simulation that anyone can easily create a city. Become a city development designer "Metropolismania" and create a city as you wish! In this work, transportation such as trains, buses, monorails, and highways are also available! You can enjoy urban development with a spacious space, such as crossing a monorail over a railroad or highway.

name: Brake Away
description:
Brake Away is a casual racing mobile game where the player has to control multiple cars and keep them from crashing into each other.

As time passes new cars will enter the road, increasing the difficulty. Players can earn coins and use them to unlock new cars and tracks.

name: Free Hugs Inc.
description: Free Hugs Inc. is about hugging to make others happy. Emotional Repair is needed! People are getting more upset and you must share free hugs around to make them happy once more. Be careful that not everyone wants to be hugged, but the positive energy of a nearby hug can make them more open to receive it.

name: GG Date Me
description:
Live out your progamer fantasies in this slice-of-life dating sim set in the exciting world of professional e-sports.

Choose one of four unique and charming characters to date and relegate the others to lesser roles in your life whether they like it or not.

name: Foxes and Cows
description:
Bulls and cows is a mind game (puzzle) where the player has to guess the secret code.

After each guess the players gets two hints as to how close he is, the number of bulls is the amount of right symbols in the right place, the number of cows is the amount of right symbols, but in the wrong place.

There's a twist however, in that you will be competing against another (AI controlled) player, taking turns to guess the code. Whoever guesses it first wins.

Want a scary experience? Set the difficulty to maximum then keep track of your win to loss ratio...

name: Worst Dating Sim
description:
In modern day Japan there lives two rival gangs: Spurious and Kosher.

The Kosher gang demands justice while Spurious demands freedom. While these two gangs are causing a ruckus, there is a lonesome boy caught up in all of it. It's you! A total loser who is deathly afraid of thugs. But perhaps you can overcome your fear? Maybe you can even ... fall in love?! Or get punched a lot accompanied by a voice grumbling "MRGRGR."

WORST DATING SIM is a shitpost dating sim involving thugs, hugs, and ughs. I hope you enjoy!

A summer road trip leads to an unexpected pause in Gravity Falls. Can you capture the heart of one of the Mystery Shack’s most eligible bachelors? Or will you leave empty-handed?

name: A Cottage Story
description: Play the day-to-day life of the apothecary who lives in Rossenward forest completely removed from modern society. Rossenward forest is home to a number of mystical creatures including fairies, goblins, giants and satyrs, many of whom you consider neighbors and clients. The day is like any other as you tend to the cottage left behind by your godmother, until you're visited by a curious stranger with an urgent request...

name: Crossroad Crash
description: The game where all cars are controlled only by you. Try to avoid accidents, but if you have an accident, it doesn't matter, rewinding time will help you think about the next step. Demonstrate the speed of your reaction on the interesting levels of this game. Control the speed of cars at the intersection, think carefully about your actions so that cars moving on intersecting roads do not crash into each other. Discover intersections in different parts of the world, including New York and Paris. Train and set incredible records.

name: One Last Memory
description: One Last Memory is an emotional story driven exploration game about an old man who re-discovers his own past and lost memories on his journey through the beauty of nature. It is an adventure filled with joy, sadness and breathtaking locations and environments that are waiting to be discovered.

description: You are the king of the jungle and you battle through the majestic landscape of your empire. Overcome obstacles, fight your way through and send your opponents off with their tails between their legs. Get at them with a roar! Explore this funny, action-packed platform game with the brave King Leo – hours of fun guaranteed.

name: Handpan
description: The ultimate Handpan simulator is now available on Nintendo Switch Unlike most other instruments playing the handpan on Nintendo Switch is really easy to learn, compose and play amazing music for your your friends and family. Play Handpan, also known as a hang drum, with either the touch screen or Joy-Con and easily change the tone or the scale of the handpan and produce your own musical creations. You can also choose between the Solo or Duo mode (two handpans)

name: Galaxy Shooter
description: A single starship can succeed where a squadron will fail? Ready your sky force for ruthless space battle and fly through the chaotic barrage of asteroids & bullets to attack space invasion in our alien shooter game! Upgrade your starship and put an end to the evil Kraathu Empire. Why? Because only you and your space team can restore peace in the galaxy threatened by alien invaders! Shoot ’em up, repel their galaxy attack!

name: Air Stunt Racing
description: Air Stunt Racing is a original, 3D high speed air racing with stunt planes! Compete in high-adrenaline races of six, with boosters, riffles and power ups.

name: The Prince of Landis
description: In the year 198X, young Evan must survive a bleak life in the snowy backwater of Landis, Oregon. One fateful day, his existence is forever changed by the dark influences of a strange visitor from another world. With the guidance of his new ally, can Evan stand up against schoolyard bullies? Will he have the courage to stand up for himself? The Prince of Landis combines the character-driven story and dialog of a visual novel with the exploration and puzzle-solving of an adventure game.

name: 890B
description: In the near future, severe pollution has rendered Earth uninhabitable, and now it falls to you to discover a solution. Take the role of Noah, a scientist tasked with locating a new planet with similar specifications to our own. Explore a research lab, find useful items, solve a variety of puzzles and make key choices that will determine your fate and that of mankind. 890B is a top-down 3D adventure game that features a minimalistic yet thought-provoking and impactful storytelling style, one that is largely dictated by player actions. The task at hand is daunting, and there are multiple endings that can result from your successes and failures. Will you guide humanity forward or leave them to extinction?

name: Emergency Driver Simulator
description: Complete each of the tasks as diligently as you can, showing your skills and earning stars for your progress. Show everyone you're the top driver, able to complete each job without fault, quickly climb the ranks and become the City Hero you were always meant to be! Emergency Driver Simulator is a unique driving game that allows you to take up multiple careers and show your skills in every one of them. Your work will be done in the early morning hours, when most of the people people are sound asleep. Their safety though will be in your hands! Enter the road and engage in a variety of jobs and trials. From simple, everyday tasks to real emergencies, it will be up to you to keep the city functioning!

name: Om Nom: Run
description: OM NOM: RUN is an arcade action game with clear basic goals: run, bypass obstacles along the way and reach the finish line. You can count on: One Om Nom in many outfits - a rubber glove thief, icy hero, fiery flame? It’s up to you! Choose from crazy hats, capes and pants.

name: Hashihime of the Old Book Town append
description: After the release of many related titles, a Taisho Era boy's love mystery - "Hashihime of the Old Book Town", will be ported to Nintendo Switch!

name: Tank De La Muerta
description: Tank de la Muerta follows Enrique, a normal zombie, humbly living in the cemetery, determined to find the love of his life. Throughout his wanderings, and innumerous parties, Enrique will have to make choices, that will impact the very foundation of the relationship with his friends, or may lead to nothing at all. Will he be able to find love?

name: Sports & Wild Pinball
description: Enjoy 6 games in one with the perfect reproduction of real pinball machines, with all kinds of graphic details and sounds. Discover all the secrets, in these thrilling games, a great challenge awaits you. Complete all the missions and become number 1 in the world or the best among your Friends, posting your high score on the online leaderboard. This pack includes: Soccer Pinball, Touchdown Pinball, Basketball Pinball, Jurassic Pinball, Safari Pinball, and Shark Pinball.

name: 20 Ladies
description: Enter a world of simple pleasures and minimalistic design, where your only goal is to navigate cleverly arranged stages, avoid spikes and locate beautiful female companions hidden in the environment. But beware of hazards! Break a heart three times, and you’ll instantly respawn at the beginning, with your lady counter reset to zero. You’ll need to touch them all without dying in order to proceed to the next stage and unlock an alluring image for each one you complete. Platforms in the foreground are silhouetted against lush hand-drawn backdrops. Clouds pass by overhead, trees sway in the breeze and historical architecture dots the landscape as mellow tunes accompany you on a chill quest for love. Your best times are tracked with each playthrough, inviting you to come back and top your own record.

name: Broil My Buns
description: A fast food based dating simulator!

name: Colorful Mirai
description: A VN about a girl going through an art block in the most important moment of her life.

name: The Knife of the Traitor
description: The Knife of the Traitor is a short visual novel. A comedy with bits of mystery and romance!

name: If I'm broken, you are too.
description: A prototype game where you speak to the monster you created.

name: 6 AM at The Chum Bucket
description: After quitting his job, Squidward decides to work at The Chum Bucket, but things go horribly wrong at 6 AM...

name: The Sock Epic
description: What happens to socks that go missing in the wash? They end up in the Realm of Lost Things!

name: Island Farmer
description: Farms are set up in islands over calm and clear water. In this tiny fantasy experience, that is easy to do and very relaxing, just like a 3D jigsaw puzzle. Carefully observe the island, try to memorize it, then shuffle the blocks. Swap blocks to reproduce the desired island and it will compose the archipelago. There is no time limit, no logic challenges, nor resources to manage, so you can calmly just focus on the core mechanics while listening to a soothing soundtrack.

name: Pixel Heroes: Mega Byte & Magic
description:
Enter the world of PIXEL HEROES and prepare yourself for a thrilling RPG/Roguelike experience like you have never seen before!

In the new Arena mode, exclusive to Switch, players can freely choose a party from the entire hero pool and take them into a series of infinite battles that get harder as you progress. Special bonus effects can be selected to modify the next battle, making it easier, or more rewarding.

name: .Dog
description: This is the dog game in which you must jump onto all your foes in order to move to the next level. The game is super fun and rated for all ages.

name: Popeye
description: The official Popeye game in which you play the spinach eating sailor in this modernized adaptation of the classic arcade game. The objective of the game is to get the highest score by completing as many levels as you can by collecting hearts and letters thrown down by Olive all while trying to avoid the dangers of the witch, vulture and Popeye's rival Brutus. Find and eat the spinach and get the special powers needed to punch your enemies into the sea and become faster at collecting the items before they return. Popeye is a simple, pick up and play, fast action, fun game which anyone can play, but be warned winning a high score won't come easy.

name: I accidently insulted a witch and now all of my clothes are sentient and they hate me!
description: A strange RPG where you have to go round your room, convincing your clothes to be, well, your clothes again.

name: Anime Dream Girl
description: A Dating Reality Show RPG

name: Hallways of Fear
description: Horror and suspense game where you need to explore mazes and escape the monsters that inhabit each corridor.

name: A Monster's Insight
description: Gaslight eldritch horrors or die trying

name: The Road of Light
description: The Road of Light is a linear puzzle dungeon that is mostly system agnostic but is compatible created for the rules light ttrpg Mörk Borg.

name: Nymble
description: Join Jack as he climbs the never-ending beanstalk in this cute turn-based puzzle platformer adventure. Explore 5 exciting worlds and 100 levels, encountering a vibrant cast of enemies each with their own unique abilities along the way.

name: Placing Heroes: The Legend of Doomsday
description: Placing Heroes: The Legend of Doomsday is a casual on-hook strategy RPG game. The game uses a magnificent world view, perfectly combines the mythological background with the game experience, and the pictures are beautiful and exquisite.Send your hero squad to embark on a magical adventure with millions of players, go deep into ancient ruins, travel through forest fortresses to fight evil forces and protect the light of the world.

name: Belly
description: An organic and dark Shoot 'em up experience.

name: Oh, Terry!
description: A visual novel about a monster lover

name: Nightmare traveler
description: Save your sister from a monster that stalks her in nightmares.

name: They Grow
description: Survive as enemies grow and mutate in real-time as you try to save humanity from disease.

name: Hitogotchi
description: Reversed Tamagotchi Love Story

name: On.Off
description: Is somebody there?

name: Midnight Cartridge
description: an old cartridge you found from the forest

name: The Beast in the Maze
description: Explore the maze, meet the Beast.

name: Dyschronia: Chronos Alternate
description: Become Hal, an inspector with the ability to manipulate the past. Your mission is to solve a crime in the city where no crime is possible. Investigate in the real world and the dream world. Solve the mysteries that the citizens and places hide and survive the threats that will try to stop you. You're the only one able to reveal the truth and avoid the foresight of the destruction of the city after 7 days to become true!

name: A Night at Manster Mansion
description: Woken in the night by your boss, you must go uncover the murder at the mysterious Manster Mansion belonging to the most ruthless mafia clan in the world. Will you be able to get out unscathed or will you perish like the typical victim of their cruelty?

name: Monster Pub: Chapter 2
description: A casual narrative game about making friends!

name: Markov Alg
description: Markov Alg (short for "Markov Algorithm") is a retro-style puzzle game where you navigate game fields filled with code and instructions, and transform strings of symbols to finally get to your goal.

name: Bert the Barbarian
description:
Bert the Barbarian is an action-arcade platform game made with charming clay animation that might remind you of old English children's TV series. You control the eponymous barbarian Bert who must find his way through ramparts while fighting or evading numerically superior foes.

Bert the Barbarian is programmed in the DIV2 game development environment. Its was originally created as a DIV2 demo for a competition held by the PC Zone magazine, and won the first prize.

However, the author, Anthony Flack, never expanded the game beyond two levels that will cycle indefinitely until you run out of continues. A Windows version is also available. Later, Bert the Barbarian was ported to other platforms, and may be also played in browser.

name: Immortal: Mors tud, vita mea
description: A hololive fangame where you must seek Calliope's help to return to life.

name: Monstructs: Makers and Mayhem
description: Make your own monsters and save the world!!

name: Lounge Lord
description: Underground DJ sim

name: Thought Police
description: A neon-noir visual novel about interrogating witnesses, the latest in bio-sensor technology, and street violence. What's scarier than a police investigation? One where they can read your mind.

name: Kitsuni
description: Atmospheric Exploration Game Made for Ludum Dare

name: June 20th
description: He collects beer caps. She loves birds. Seashells too, but not as much.

name: Daylight Savings
description: Praise the sun

name: Banana Boy and the Interdimensional Crusade
description: A boy and his quest to save the world with his bananas

name: Pentagorat
description: VIC-20 +32k Isometric adventure

name: Sharks! In Space?!
description: Claymation Space Shark Warfare

name: John Killmen
description: John Killmen

name: Make a Doll
description: use what you'll get to make a doll, alone or with your friends

name: Thief's Treasure
description: A stealth-metroidvania prototype made for Glitch Jam 1.

name: Initial Prospect
description: A journey through space using energy

name: Kryptic
description: This puzzle game filled with codes and ciphers will test your logical thinking and reasoning. Don't worry if you're having some difficulty, there's a hint system included for those who have difficulty, and there are 7 included cipher tools to make things easier.

name: Anzu
description: mobile game by Pluplume

name: Flippen
description: Addictive and challenging 2D platformer

name: Who Will...
description: A party game about dividing an inheritance.

name: Sciron
description: Help Sciron feed his pet turtle, Tim!

name: T_
description: you're so close. don't let go now.

name: RogueSweeper
description: More random than minesweeper and with more screenshakes then a Michael Bay Movie

name: Akir8
description: Chip-8 AKIRA

name: Argousze
description: Short story about an alien invasion that never happened.

name: Museum of Artists' Split Minds
description: Paintings Gallery of Mental Ill Artists

name: Pest Quest
description: A short 2D platformer about the journey of a spider.

name: Cursor Custodian
description: Use fear to guide the player!

name: Shock Block.
description: Basic block based boredom beater.

name: Greedy
description: A glorified port of a bootleg snake clone.

name: Dungeon of Choices
description: Dungeon of Choices is a short game based on old gamebooks. You are playing as a mighty knight who goes into the dungeon to get the holy grail. But your journey won't be easy. There's a lot of danger and traps on your way. Of course, not all of the things are bad, but be prepared for hard trials! The end of your adventure depends just on your decisions trough all playtime.

name: Spook's Escape
description: A haunted mansion full of traps, can you escape?

name: Billy the Cleaner
description: WGJ167 | The robots are trying to destroy everything. Use your slippery soap to clean your way through the waves

name: Thicc Wet Paper Layers
description: Multiplayer frenziness, capture the flag and slay your friends with funny traps

name: Liquid Dungeon Byproduct
description: Proc-gen Hallucinatory Dungeon Crawler

name: Last ticket for Eternity
description: Dark murder mystery game where you time travel in order to prevent your own death from happening.

name: Sewer Rave Twitter Royale
description: A short Sewer Rave spinoff game with Twitter integration for some reason.

name: Timidna's Beginning
description: Interactive comic following a young witch as she meets with an old friend.

name: Hyperbeatz
description: Rhythm game for the NES

name: Wolfskin's Curse
description: A forsaken nun must prove a monster's innocence. He is offered no voice, but she will lend hers.

name: Posey Picks and the Bus Stop
description: Posey's stuck at the bus stop! Help her choose what to do in this sweet & silly cartoon story game!

name: The Monster in the Woods
description: A brief tale of a child escaping the monster in the woods.

name: Vicarwissen
description: Haunted museums and girls and monsters, oh my! A point-n-click horror adventure.

name: Yu Jammin
description: Learn how to make music and hate your creation within the span of two minutes.

name: Feel Gear
description: Make music, save the world!

name: Hedgerow
description: Make your way through a hedgerow.

name: Rhythm Quest
description:
Rhythm Quest is the rhythm based roguelike you never knew you wanted!
Make your way down the deadly dungeon, slashing and dodging in time with the ever present demonic beat.

name: Minim
description: Jump and grind to the beat!

name: In Peaceful Days
description: Can you make the perfect teatime date?

name: Konbini Life
description: How will your Konbini Life unfold?

name: A Day in the Life of a Slice of Bread
description: Have you ever wondered what it's like to live life as a sentient slice of bread? Now's your chance to find out.

name: Investigator and the Case of the Chekhov's Gun
description: The Investigator is an Alligator who Investigates crime, alongside various faithful sidekicks. With Bobbycat, they investigate various gruesome murders, interrogate suspects, and collect clues, until the time comes to accuse the murderer. In Investigator and the Chekhov's Gun, Investigator and his sidekick The Bad Luck Duck dig deeper into what appears to be the suicide of The Bipolar Bear.

name: Kill the Prince?!
description: Don Disguises, Infiltrate a Party, Kill a Prince?!
